RAM_INST[0] = 32'b000101_00000_00001_0000000000000001; // li $r1, 1
RAM_INST[1] = 32'b000101_00000_00010_0000000000001011; // li $r2, 11
RAM_INST[2] = 32'b000101_00000_00011_0000000000000001; // li $r3, 1
RAM_INST[3] = 32'b000000_00001_00011_00011_00000_000111; //mult $r3, $r3, $r1
RAM_INST[4] = 32'b001010_00011_00000_0000000000000000; // out $r3
RAM_INST[5] = 32'b000000_00001_00001_00000_00000_001001; // inc $r1;
RAM_INST[6] = 32'b001000_00001_00010_1111111111111101; // bne $r1, $r2, -3
RAM_INST[7] = 32'b111111_00000000000000000000000000; // halt
